0.title: New Client Questionnaire

fields.description: First things first. How should we contact you in regards to your project? This information will not be published or shared.
fields.label: Contact Details

fields.description: We occasionally send text message follow ups if we can't reach you
fields.label: Text Message Number
Do You Already Have a Website?

choices.text: Yes, I want to keep and make improvements to my current site
choices.value: Yes, I want to keep and make improvements to my current site

choices.text: Yes, I want to completely replace my current site
choices.value: Yes, I want to completely replace my current site

fields.description: The information below will be published. Please double check your spelling. We will not be held liable if you make a mistake.
fields.label: General Information
Name of Organization, Project, Blog or Business
Where should we mail your printed items to?
Which social media profiles do you have?

fields.description: Can be a Google+ or Google Places Listing
fields.label: Google URL
How many pages do you need for your site?
fields.description: If it is more than 7, fill out as many as you can and we will contact you to collect the content for the other pages.

fields.label: List the Pages you would like in the menu bar

fields.description: If you have a specific color in mind you can find the hex code here
fields.label: Primary Color HEX Code

fields.description: If you have a specific color in mind you can find the hex code here
fields.label: Secondary Color HEX Code

fields.description: If you have a specific color in mind you can find the hex code here
fields.label: Accent Color HEX Code

fields.description: This is the photo that will appear prominently in social media banners, website home page banners, display advertising, etc.
fields.label: Main Photo
List at least 3 websites that you would like to model your site after and why
List only 3 goals that you would like visitors of your site to complete
fields.description: e.g. FIll Out Contact Form, Book an Appointment, Buy Product, Make a Donation, Become a Member, etc.

fields.label: Describe the style and look of the website you want
fields.description: Provide examples and links to other sites if you have them.
If you have a specific font in mind, list the name here
fields.label: Font Names
Do You Already Have Any of the Following:
If you have not purchased a domain, what is your first choice?
If your first choice is not available, what is your second choice?
Notes about domain purchase
fields.description: include where domain was purchased from and where to find login

0.postTitleTemplate: {Name of Business, Organization, Project or Blog:6}

confirmations.name: Default Confirmation
confirmations.message: Thank you. We will be in contact soon to verify and review your answers.

meta.step_name: Finalize order and copy information from Freshbooks
meta.assignee_notification_message: A new entry is pending your approval. Please check your Workflow Inbox.

meta.step_name: Verify Information and Save Domain, Hosting and WordPress login in LastPass
meta.assignee_notification_subject: {Name of Organization, Project, Blog or Business:6} Welcome Questionnaire has been completed

meta.assignee_notification_message: A new entry requires your input

meta.assignee_notification_subject: Please Install WordPress, Theme and Plugins for {Name of Organization, Project, Blog or Business:6}
Please customize the site colors and fonts

meta.workflow_notification_message:
Hi {First Name:162},

I wanted to inform you of the status of your project.

We have setup the theme and functionality of the site. We will be working on the images and content next. We may be contacting you in the next few days to provide additional content or answer questions.

Please let us know if you will not be available and who we should contact instead.

Thank you

meta.description: Order stock images and/or resize images if necessary
meta.assignee_notification_subject: Prepare Images for {Name of Organization, Project, Blog or Business:6}
meta.assignee_notification_message: Please order and resize the images and upload to WordPress media library. The images the client has provided are in Dropbox. Free stock image sites: Unsplash Gratisography Stocksnap iStockphoto free images Hubspot free stock photos contact {First Name:162} {Last Name:5} {Email Address:10} for additional images if necessary {workflow_approve_link} {workflow_reject_link}

meta.assignee_notification_subject: Please create the {How many pages do you need for your site?:84} pages needed for the site

meta.workflow_notification_subject: We're going to get started on your custom form
meta.workflow_notification_message:
Hi {First Name:162},

We're going to create the custom form you requested. 

Can you send us a list of fields that you would like to include and give us more details about where you would like the form to be featured. 

Thank you!

meta.step_name: Enter Footer and Contact Us Information
meta.assignee_notification_subject: Please create the footer and social portion of the site
